vbase|	Single file component base

vprops|	Props with type and default

##  Actions 

copy
```
name: Deploy Blog

on: [push] # push

jobs:
  build: # build

    runs-on: ubuntu-latest # Ubuntu
    
    steps:
    - name: Checkout # master
      uses: actions/checkout@v1 #  https://github.com/actions/checkout
      
    - name: Use Node.js 10.x # Node
      uses: actions/setup-node@v1 #  https://github.com/actions/setup-node
      with:
        node-version: "10.x"
    
    - name: Setup Hexo env
      env:
        HEXO_DEPLOY_PRI: ${{ secrets.HEXO_DEPLOY_PRI }} # 
      run: |
        # set up private key for deploy
        mkdir -p ~/.ssh/
        echo "$HEXO_DEPLOY_PRI" | tr -d '\r' > ~/.ssh/id_rsa # 
        chmod 600 ~/.ssh/id_rsa
        ssh-keyscan github.com >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts
        # set git infomation
        git config --global user.name 'lixuguang' # 
        git config --global user.email 'lixuguang@gmail.com' # 
        # install dependencies
        npm i -g hexo-cli # hexo
        npm i
  
    - name: Deploy
      run: |
        # publish
        rm -rf .deploy_git # 
        hexo generate && hexo deploy # 


```

---

hexo g -dfollow

### 2. .gitlab-ci.yml 
.gitlab-ci.yml  GitLab CI/CD Pipeline Configuration Reference https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/ci/yaml/README.html

#### 2.1 .gitlab-ci.yml 
- `image`  CI/CD  Docker  NodeYarnDalp rsync 
- `stages`  pipeline :
  1.  pre_build
  2.  build
  3.  deploy
- `stage`  stages 
- `variables` 
- `before_script`  script 
- `script`  stage 
- `changes`  stage 
- `refs`  stage 

.gitlab-ci.yml
```
image: registry.thunisoft.com/gitlab-ci/node:v1.8

variables:
  # $CI_PROJECT_PATH  id,
  # $CI_PROJECT_DIR   
  # $PROCESS_PATH     ()
  NODE_MODULES_PATH: /runner-cache/frontend/$CI_PROJECT_PATH/$CI_BUILD_REF_NAME/node_modules

stages:
  - pre_build # 
  - build # 
  - deploy # 

# :
  before_script: # 
    #  node_modules  node_modules 
    - /bin/bash ./ci/mkdir.sh $NODE_MODULES_PATH
    #  node_modules 
    - ln -s $NODE_MODULES_PATH .
    - cd webpack@lixuguang-project

  stage: pre_build
  script:
    - echo "npm install"
    - npm install  --network-timeout 60000 # 
  only:
    changes:
      - webpack@lixuguang-project/package.json
    refs:
      - master
      - ci

# :
  stage: build
  variables:
    CI_COMMIT_BEFORE_SHA_PATH: /mnt/gv0/gitlab-runner-cache/$CI_PROJECT_PATH
    CI_COMMIT_BEFORE_SHA_FILE_NAME: $CI_BUILD_REF_NAME.sh
    CI_COMMIT_BEFORE_SHA_FILE: /mnt/gv0/gitlab-runner-cache/$CI_PROJECT_PATH/$CI_BUILD_REF_NAME.sh
  before_script:
    #  CI CI_COMMIT_SHA 
    - /bin/bash ./ci/mkfile.sh $CI_COMMIT_BEFORE_SHA_PATH $CI_COMMIT_BEFORE_SHA_FILE_NAME
    #  node_modules 
    - ln -s $NODE_MODULES_PATH .
    - rm -rf web/share/*
    - cd webpack@lixuguang-projects
  script:
    # ci
    - source $CI_COMMIT_BEFORE_SHA_FILE
    - echo "CI_COMMIT_BEFORE_SHA=$CI_COMMIT_SHA" > $CI_COMMIT_BEFORE_SHA_FILE
    - python3 ../ci/build.py   # 
    - /bin/bash ../ci/commit.sh   # 
  only:
    changes:
      - www_src/**/*
    refs:
      - master
      - ci

# :
  stage: deploy
  variables:
    PROCESS_PATH: /mnt/gv0/gitlab-runner-cache/deploy/process/$CI_JOB_ID  # 
  script:
    - mkdir $PROCESS_PATH # 
    - dplt $CI_PROJECT_DIR/.deploy_test.yml $CI_PROJECT_PATH $CI_PROJECT_DIR/web/ $PROCESS_PATH
    # dplt yml
    - echo "http://172.18.78.11:8089/log?path="$PROCESS_PATH
    - echo `ls $PROCESS_PATH/*.log`
  only:
    changes:
      - web/**/*
    refs:
      - test
```
